description:
Shino is scouted by the same company that manages Triple Booking, a popular idol group, and there she finds what it means to be an idol. The student council also takes charge of training the students on how to stay safe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol President / Attack Item Twitch Twitch
アイドル生徒会長 / 攻撃アイテムビクッビクン
